summary: Frontend testing completed for Turkish AI UGC video creation platform. All critical features working correctly after fix for 'process is not defined' error.

issues: Video playback shows loading spinner due to browser autoplay restrictions - expected behavior, not a bug

critical_code_review_comments: Fix applied correctly: process.env replaced with import.meta.env in DifferenceSection.tsx and video-slider.tsx
Pricing component now uses default plans when 'plans' prop not provided - good defensive coding
context_for_next_testing_agent: Landing page blank screen issue is FIXED. All components render correctly. Video playback errors in console are browser autoplay policy restrictions, not application bugs. Login flow works with provided credentials.

tests_executed.test: Landing page loads without JavaScript errors
tests_executed.details: Page loads with HTTP 200, no 'process is not defined' error

tests_executed.test: Hero section displays 'Yapay Zeka ile UGC Video Üret'
Login form accepts email and password

tests_executed.details: Dashboard shows with sidebar, stats, and user's 3 videos
